ROW.Details: Unit ms.Acquiring 1 frame image time. only for PKI panel.
Perkin Elmer 1622 gain mode. 0 --- 0.25pF(1621 only); 1 --- 0.5pF; 2 --- 1pF; 3 --- 2pF; 4 --- 4pF; 5 --- 8pF.
Perkin Elemer 1622 binning mode. 1 means no binning ;2 means 2 x 2 binning.
Unit ms.Software trigger beam on delay time.
Capture frame number when capture mode is sequence.
Software Trigger COM port set.
Unit mm.
Unit mm.Panel width.
Unit mm.Panel height.
Fusion image ratio when using double exposure mode. ratio is treatment image ratio.
Set link panel manually. T --- can link panel, F --- simulate panel capture image.
First image is treatment field when overlay two images using double exposure.
Invert image color LUT.
'T' means quick enhance image.
Unit ms.1622 restart preparing to wait beam interval time on when using hardware trigger. default 19s.
Offset calibration number. only for PKI panel.
'T' means Integrated mode can be seen in capture window.
Panel model.
1800I exposure time, default 2000ms.
1800I exposure delay time, defult 100ms. user need not set.
1800I exposure wait time, default 5ms.
Panel Mac address when link 1622, user need not set.
Software Trigger channel ID.
Unit ms.Software Trigger timeout
Unit ms. Software trigger Beam on disappearing interval time.
Unit ms. Software trigger signal feed back interval time.
Trigger mode selection only for PKI panel. HIS_SYNCMODE_SOFT_TRIGGER = 1, HIS_SYNCMODE_INTERNAL_TIMER = 2, HIS_SYNCMODE_EXTERNAL_TRIGGER = 3, HIS_SYNCMODE_FREE_RUNNING = 4

Tigger mode selection only for PKI panel. DDD = 0, Data Delivered on Demand DDD_withoutClearence = 1, Data Delivered on Demand without clearance scan Linewise = 2, (Start / Stop Trigger) Framewise = 3 (default)
Offset file path,which used by PKI gain calibration algorithm.
Gain file path,which used by PKI gain calibration algorithm.do not use at present.
Gain squence file path,which used by PKI gain calibration algorithm.
Pixel map file path,which used by PKI gain calibration algorithm.
auto stop capturing image when continuous mode.
auto stop capturing image must arrive min value threshold secondly.
auto stop capturing image must arrive max value threshold firstly.

case 1:Exposure inhomogeneous/exposure prematurely/exposure too late,some rows gray value of front larger than rows back 30% or above. case 2:Total gray value is too low,its threshold is 15000. case 3:Gray value exists overflow,it will be fail if 1% gray value is 65536. case 4:Exists analogy pluse signal. case 5:Exists occlusions on image which is think as between 50%~80% of max gray value.
'T' means do dynamic offset calibration on capture pop window.
'1' link panel by IP.other case, link panel by ID then IP. only for 1622 panel.

1800I panel sync mode. UNDEF_SYNC(0) --- undefined sync mode. EXT_SYNC(1) --- external sync mode (exist sync cable). SOFT_SYNC(2) --- software sync mode. AUTO_SYNC(3) --- auto sync mode. MANUAL_SYNC(4) --- manual sync mode. SCAN_SYNC(5) --- ? AED_SYNC(6) --- exrernal sync mode only for linatech.
Arifact eliminate model seletion in capture pop window.
Set lag frame number after exposure, when do artifact eliminate model.
User habits.system auto record. save open file folder.
User habits.system auto record. save his file folder.
Unit pixel. Set detection region which devide total image, when do Pixel correction calibration in capture calibration window. Default 4.
Set defective pixel threshold ratio, when do Pixel correction calibration in capture calibration window. Default 0.9.
Show average mode in capture window. 0, do not show average mode. 1,PKI itsself average mode with gain correction. 2,sequence capture image and integrate images.
'T' means do dynamic offset calibration on capture pop window for PKI.
Automatic system generation;
Automatic system generation; Acquire image index today,which need regenerating according to 'CaprueDate'.
1800I receive image head lenght,default 65536.
Acquire image with gain or not.
Acquire image with gain or not,on gain calibration window.
Timing0 = 0;Timing1 = 1;Timing2 = 2;Timing3 = 3; Timing4 = 4;Timing5 = 5;Timing6 = 6;Timing7 = 7.
1800I(0.96 Rad mode) gain calibration function; 'T' is CR_execute_linear_cal; 'F' is CR_execute_portable_cal.
1800I(0.96 fluoro mode) dynamic offset calibration integration time.
Com Port name
hardware trigger mode; 0 manual setting; 1 static capturing mode;2 dynamic capturing mode.
set hardware trigger beam on delay time.
hardware trigger frame time(SW2) defaut 300ms.
hardware trigger frame time(SW3) defaut 0ms.
hardware trigger frame number.
show hardware trigger button which can simulate signal on capture window.
Panel Check Threshold
1800I panel capture mode
Show Beam MU info in capture module window.
Discard dark frame number before capture image.
Discard dark frame number after capture image.
Discard dark frame number when entering capture window.
1800I exposure time(discard dark image),default 500ms.
1800I exposure delay time(discard dark image), defult 100ms.
1800I exposure wait time(discard dark image), default 5ms.
Discard dark image when 1622/1640 caputure image.
Discard dark image threshold when 1622/1640 caputure image.
Filter good image threshold when 1622/1640 caputure image.
Acquire image with gain or not,on capture window.
Monitor panel link status after link panel successfully.
'T' means filter image couch grid noise.
1800I Gain Value.
Load image width with Raw format
Load image height with Raw format
Convert 2816 to 2688 cut image 64 pixel every side.
'T' --- Replace panel SDK according to firmware version when start IVS.
